mapper.select: SELECT RECRT_YEAR FROM RECRT_SCHDL GROUP BY RECRT_YEAR ORDER BY RECRT_YEAR DESC
SELECT DEPARTMENT FROM CRCLM_INFO GROUP BY DEPARTMENT

select.if: SELECT c.RECRT_YEAR, DEPARTMENT, APPL_NUM, SCHDL_NAME FROM CRCLM_INFO c JOIN RECRT_SCHDL r ON r.RECRT_YEAR = c.RECRT_YEAR AND r.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = c.RECRT_SCHDL_CD WHERE c.RECRT_YEAR = #{RECRT_YEAR } AND c.RECRT_SCHDL_CD = #{RECRT_SCHDL_CD }
